column2: RUSSIAN

Enter the Emerald Dream

Ask Ancient for Mark
Many ancients are part of the Cenarion Circle. You can ask one of them to mark you with its power.
Train with Archdruids
One of the purposes of the Cenarion Circle is to spread druidic knowledge in Azeroth. You can ask them for training, increasing your class level in the process.
Train Young Druid
You have trained many new druids in the Cenarion Circle. Maybe you should invite one of them to join your court?
Build Cenarion Enclave
Invite your fellow members to create a Cenarion Enclave in your lands.
Raise Host of the Wilds
The Cenarion Circle has many powerful creatures of the forests among its members. Now in times of war you can unleash them upon your enemies.
the Cenarion Circle

Named in honour of the demigod Cenarius, the Cenarion Circle ensures the protection of nature and its creatures. Furthermore, the members of this faction act as keepers of ancient lore and pay particular attention to the traditional ways of the druids. In their role as protectors of nature, the men and women of the Cenarion Circle also strive to maintain the fragile balance within the world.
Harmony
Tender
Tender
Hierophant
Hierophant
Instructor
Instructor
Keeper
Keeper
Archdruid
Archdruid
the Sisterhood of Elune

The Sisterhood of Elune could be the oldest night elf religious and magical order, predating the Quel'dorei by some 2,000 years. As the name implies, they are an order of priestesses dedicated to the worship and servitude of the moon goddess Elune. The sisterhood is led by the high priestess of Elune while the priestesses of the moon are the elite of the organisation. They have existed long before the Great Sundering, and formal worship dates back about 15,000 years.
Devotion

Novice

Disciple

Become Priestess of Elune
Train to become a devotee of the moon goddess.
Train Disciple
You have trained many new priestesses in the Sisterhood of Elune. Maybe you should invite one of them to join your court?
Build Temple of Elune
Use the resources of the sisterhood to create a new temple in your lands.
Enter the Emerald Dream
Druids should spend their lives in the Emerald Dream. Use the decision in the §YIntrigue§! menu to enter it.
To complete this quest use §YEnter the Emerald Dream§! decision in the §YIntrigue§! menu.
Write Libram
As an experienced paladin, you can use your wisdom and piety to write a holy book.
Forge Runeblade
Use unholy magic to forge a powerful runic blade.
the Dire
the Hungering
Become Two-headed Ogre
Use powerful magical energies to turn yourself into a §YTwo-headed Ogre§!.
Turn into Two-headed Ogre
Use powerful magical energies to turn someone into a §YTwo-headed Ogre§!.

You start preparing the ritual to honour the local elementals. First you choose a hill known for having a strong connection to the elements and spirits as place of your ritual. There is also a question of who will oversee the ceremony.
I will ask a local shaman for help.
I will do it by myself.

Almost everything needed for the ritual is prepared. The only thing you still lack is the traditional offerings for the elementals. The shaman explains to you that according to tradition you should be the one to gather them. However, should someone of your status gather flowers and rocks?
Buy them from an alchemist.
I will gather them myself as tradition commands.
Almost everything needed for the ritual is prepared. The only thing you still lack is the traditional offerings for the elementals.
I will gather them myself as tradition commands.

After gathering all the ingredients you journey to the nearby hill. After an hour of travel you arrive at your destination. Despite the fact that the hill looks unimpressive, you can feel the presence of the elemental spirits all around you.
Start the ceremony.

After a quick preparation the ritual has started. Nearly an hour has passed but slowly elementals has started gathering on the hill. They look at you silently, waiting for you to talk. You thank them for their help, for this land in which your people live. In response you see a beautiful spectacle, the elementals dancing all around you in perfect harmony.
Our land will prosper with the help of the spirits.
I am honoured.

After a quick preparation the ritual has started. Nearly an hour has passed but slowly elementals have started gathering on the hill. They look at you silently, waiting for you to talk. You ask for their help, so this land will thrive like never before. In response you see a terrific spectacle. The ground is shaking, the sky is roaring and flooding the land with rain.
What have we done?
What have I done?

You start the ritual with placing the gifts on the altar, after that you close your eyes and wait. Some time later you can see several transparent humanoid shapes forming before your eyes. They seem to wait for you to talk.
I seek power to destroy my enemies.
I seek guidance from my forefathers.
I seek wisdom of those before me.
After hearing your pleas the spirits of your ancestors quickly vanish, leaving you with nothing more than a positive feeling that you have been heard.
I will not bring shame to our name!
I will bring prosperity to our lands!
I will pass this wisdom to my descendants!

You gathered with the elders to prepare ritual to the venerable Earth Mother. One of them suggested that we should focus on her left eye Mu'sha instead. He was however countered by proposition to honour An'she, the rigth eye. After long argument, the elders look to you to decide.
Prepare a ritual to Earth Mother.
Prepare a ritual to Mu'sha.
Prepare a ritual to An'she.
After long ceremonies and prayers, the ritual has finally come to an end. With each minute you can feel something changing within you. It seems you have truly been blessed.
I'm thankful for your protection.
May the Moon's light protect me.
May the Sun's light protect me.
Powerful elementals can be a great help in dire times. What kind of elemental do you seek help from?
I will seek help from the earth elemental.
I will seek help from the water elemental.
I will seek help from the air elemental.
I will seek help from the fire elemental.
I will seek help from the ice elemental.
I will seek help from the sand elemental.

You journey to a nearby cave which is the dwelling of a powerful earth elemental. After entering it, you call to him asking for his help. A mighty and majestic creature of earth appears before you. It looks at you waiting for you to speak. You ask for his help with strengthening your bond with the earth spirits.
What will his answer be?
The earth elemental starts channeling his power into you. You feel its warmth and strength. You feel that your connection to earth is stronger then ever before.
I am thankful for this power.

The earth elemental starts channeling his power into you. You feel its might as the ground starts shaking. Soon you realize that the elemental is not happy with you and start to run. You barely escape the cave before it closes.
What have I done wrong?
The earth elemental offers you power in exchange for serving his mistress, Therazane the Stonemother. It looks at you awaiting an answer. Rejecting him might not be the best choice.
I will serve in exchange for power.
I will never be a slave.

You journey to a nearby underwater cave which is the dwelling of a powerful water elemental. After entering it, you call to him asking for his help. A mighty and majestic creature of water appears before you. It looks at you waiting for you to speak. You ask for his help with strengthening your bond with the water spirits.
What will his answer be?
The water elemental starts channeling his power into you. You feel its calm and strength. You feel that your connection to water is stronger then ever before.
I am thankful for this power.

The water elemental starts channeling his power into you. You feel its might as the water starts flowing into the cave. Soon you realize that the elemental is not happy with you and start to run. You barely escape the cave before it submerges under water.
What have I done wrong?
The water elemental offers you power in exchange for serving his master, Neptulon the Tidehunter. It looks at you awaiting an answer. Rejecting him might not be the best choice.
I will serve in exchange for power.
I will never be a slave.

You journey to a nearby fire chasm which is the dwelling of a powerful fire elemental. After entering it, you call to him asking for his help. A mighty and majestic creature of fire appears before you. It looks at you waiting for you to speak. You ask for his help with strengthening your bond with the fire spirits.
What will his answer be?
The fire elemental starts channeling his power into you. You feel its passion and strength. You feel that your connection to fire is stronger then ever before.
I am thankful for this power.

The fire elemental starts channeling his power into you. You feel its might as lava starts seeping from the ground. Soon you realize that the elemental is not happy with you and start to run. You barely escape the chasm before it's filled with lava.
What have I done wrong?
The fire elemental offers you power in exchange for serving his master, Ragnaros the Firelord. It looks at you awaiting an answer. Rejecting him might not be the best choice.
I will serve in exchange for power.
I will never be a slave.

You journey to a nearby hill which is the dwelling of a powerful air elemental. After climbing it, you call to him asking for his help. A mighty and majestic creature of air appears before you. It looks at you waiting for you to speak. You ask for his help with strengthening your bond with the air spirits.
What will his answer be?
The air elemental starts channeling his power into you. You feel its freedom and strength. You feel that your connection to air is stronger then ever before.
I am thankful for this power.

The air elemental starts channeling his power into you. You feel its might as the winds blow all around you. Soon you realize that the elemental is not happy with you and start to run. You barely escape the hill before it's destroyed by the powerful winds.
What have I done wrong?
The air elemental offers you power in exchange for serving his master, Al'Akir the Windlord. It looks at you awaiting an answer. Rejecting him might not be the best choice.
I will serve in exchange for power.
I will never be a slave.

You journey to a nearby glacier which is the dwelling of a powerful ice elemental. After climbing it, you call to him asking for his help. A mighty and majestic creature of ice appears before you. It looks at you waiting for you to speak. You ask for his help with strengthening your bond with the element of ice.
What will his answer be?
The ice elemental starts channeling his power into you. You feel chilling power of frost all around you. You feel that your connection to the ice is stronger then ever before.
I am thankful for this power.

The ice elemental starts channeling his power into you. You feel its might as the frost creeps throughout your body. Soon you realize that the elemental is not happy with you and start to run. You barely escape before the elemental turns into an icicle.
What have I done wrong?

You journey to nearby a dune which is a dwelling of a powerful sand elemental. After arriving at it, you call to him asking for his help. A mighty and majestic creature of sand appears before you. It looks at you waiting for you to speak. You ask for his help with strengthening your bond with the element of sand.
What will his answer be?
The sand elemental starts channeling his power into you. You feel the power and the sand shifting below your feet. You feel that your connection to the sand is stronger then ever before.
I am thankful for this power.

The sand elemental starts channeling his power into you. You feel its might as nearby dunes start coming your way like a tidal waves. Soon you realize that the elemental is not happy with you and start to run. You barely escape being trapped in shifting sands.
What have I done wrong?
It is tradition to have tidesages bless both land and ships, bringing winds of fortune.
I will send a letter to the Shrine of the Storm.
After a week of waiting, one of the renowned tidesages arrived. The tidesage called upon the power of the Tidemother to bless our land and ships, which will surely bring prosperity to our lands.
Excellent.
After a week of waiting, a group of renowned tidesages arrived. The tidesages called upon the power of the Tidemother to bless our land and ships, which will surely bring prosperity to our lands.
Excellent.
The night elves have worshiped the Goddess Elune since time immemorial. Now you are the one that's focused in prayer. What will you ask of the Moon Goddess?
I ask for your protection Mother Moon.
It seems like your prayers have been answered. You can feel the warmth of the moonlight as it's shining down upon you and with it, all your doubts and worries vanish from your mind.
Praise Elune.
As you are enveloped by moonlight, you can feel Elune's power coursing throughout your entire body. It looks like Mother Moon especially favours you.
Praise Elune.

The ritual takes place deep inside a forest. The view of night sky is breathtaking, but your contemplation is interrupted when large dark creatures emerge from behind the trees. You quickly realize it's the pack that agreed to grant you their gift. You nervously bow before the Alpha as your gazes meet, at first you feel uneasy until he cuts into his own arm, extending the bleeding arm as an offer.
Drink the blood.
The entire tribe has gathered to honour the twin gods, Ursoc and Ursol. You stand before the shaman who asks you which brothers' blessing you seek.
I seek Ursoc's strength.
I seek Ursol's wisdom.

The ritual festivities had taken the whole night. After hours of ceremonies and offerings you kneel before the totems of Ursoc and Ursol. You can feel something changing within you. The shaman walks up to you and tells you that you have been granted the blessing you sought after.
I will not dissapoint Ursoc.
I will not dissapoint Ursol.
You have decided to seek out an ancient guardian to ask it for its blessing. Which ancient guardian will you try to find?
I will seek out Ashamane.
I will seek out Aviana.
I will seek out Ursoc.
More.
You have decided to seek out an ancient guardian and ask for its blessing. Which one will you try to find?
I will seek out Goldrinn.
I will seek out Malorne.
More.

You have decided to try to gain Ashamane's blessing. A powerful Wild God panther that died during the War of the Ancients but her spirit lives on in the Emerald Dream. By departing on a spiritual journey to the wilds you may be able to communicate with her spirit and gain her blessing.
I will depart immediately.

After spending weeks living among the saber cats in the wilds you feel attuned with their way of life. After one of the hunts, a large transparent panther appears before you. You instantly realize it's Ashamane. She praises your dedication and bestows her blessing upon you. She then vanishes leaving you with your newfound strength.
I will not disappoint you.
Despite spending weeks in the wilds you have still failed to create any connection with Ashamane. It seems like the Wild God has decided to ignore you.
I should just give up and try again in a few years.

You have decided to try to gain Aviana's blessing. The Mistress of the Mother Tree died during the War of the Ancients but her spirit lives on in the Emerald Dream. By departing on a spiritual journey to the wilds you may be able to communicate with her spirit and gain her blessing.
I will depart immediately.

After spending weeks living among different birds of prey in the wilds you feel attuned with their way of life. After one of the hunts, a large transparent harpy appears before you. You instantly realize it's Aviana. She praises your dedication and bestows her blessing upon you. She then vanishes leaving you with your newfound strength.
Despite spending weeks in the wilds you have still failed to create any connection with Aviana. It seems like the Wild God has decided to ignore you.
I should just give up and try again in a few years.

You have decided to try and gain Ursoc's blessing. The Bear Lord died during the War of the Ancients but his spirit lives on in the Emerald Dream. By departing on a spiritual journey to the wilds you may be able to communicate with his spirit and gain his blessing.
I will depart immediately.

After spending weeks living among the bears in the wilds you feel attuned with their way of life. After one of the hunts, a large transparent bear appears before you. You instantly realize it's Ursoc. He praises your dedication and bestows his blessing upon you. He then vanishes leaving you with your newfound strength.
Despite spending weeks in the wilds you have still failed to create any connection with Ursoc. It seems like the Wild God has decided to ignore you.
I should just give up and try again in few years.

You have decided to try and gain Goldrinn's blessing. The Great Wolf died during the War of the Ancients but his spirit lives on in the Emerald Dream. By departing on a spiritual journey to the wilds you may be able to communicate with his spirit and gain his blessing.
I will depart immediately.

After spending weeks living among the wolves in the wilds you feel attuned with their way of life. After one of the hunts, a large transparent wolf appears before you. You instantly realize it's Goldrinn. He praises your dedication and bestows his blessing upon you. He then vanishes leaving you with your newfound strength.
Despite spending weeks in the wilds you have still failed to create any connection with Goldrinn. It seems like the Wild God has decided to ignore you.
I should just give up and try again in a few years.

You have decided to try to gain Malorne's blessing. The White Stag died during the War of the Ancients but his spirit lives on in the Emerald Dream. By departing on a spiritual journey to the wilds you may be able to communicate with his spirit and gain his blessing.
I will depart immediately.

After spending weeks living among the deer in the wilds you feel attuned with their way of life. One day a large transparent stag appears before you. You instantly realize it's Malorne. He praises your dedication and bestows his blessing upon you. He then vanishes leaving you with your newfound strength.
Despite spending weeks in the wilds you have still failed to create any connection with Malorne. It seems like the Wild God has decided to ignore you.
I should just give up and try again in a few years.
You've been restless for the whole day, eagerly awaiting the dusk. At last the moment has come, you let out a powerful howl before running off into the wilds.
The hunt begins.
After some time of hunting you had finally picked up a scent. You follow it to large swath of bushes. Your prey finnaly realizes your presence and jumps out of thicket trying to escape.
It is a nimble deer!
It is a majestic stag!
It is a huge bear!
It is a pathetic sheep?!
You run after the deer, trying to catch your prey. It is agile but no match for your speed. After a few dozen seconds you finally catch up to it and plunge your fangs into its neck.
OWOOOOOOOOOO!

You run after the stag, trying to catch your prey. Suddenly it turns around and starts charging at you. You barely dodge and grab it by the neck. The beast tries to fight but after a few seconds of struggling you snap its neck, nearly tearing its head from the rest of the body.
OWOOOOOOOOOO!

You run after the bear, trying to catch your prey. After a few seconds the beast realizes that it will not escape and instead tries to fight. It stand up on its hind legs and attacks you with its claws. After a long and bloody fight, the mighty beast finally falls before you. You pick it up with your monstrous strength and release a powerful howl.
OWOOOOOOOOOO!
You quickly catch the sheep and shred it to pieces. It is a miserable prey, unworthy of your hunting skills.
Pathetic.
The harvest-witches are known for their nature magic, but they're also powerful alchemists. What type of potion would you ask the harvest-witch to make?
I want to be more persuasive.
I want to be stronger.
I want to be thriftier.
More.
The harvest_witches are known for their nature magic, but they're also a powerful alchemists. What type of potion would you ask the harvest-witch to make?
I want to be more cunning.
I want to be wiser.
More.
After a few days a harvest-witch arrives at your court with the elixir. She presents it to you and assures you of its effects and that it is safe.
I feel like I could convince Sargeras to stop the Burning Crusade.
I feel like I could wrestle with Deathwing.
I feel like I could scam Gallywix.
I feel like I could assasinate Garona.
I feel like I could beat Medivh in chess.
You start your journey to Moonglade, the sacred place of druidism. It is a tradition for young druids to learn the cat form from the Great Cat Spirit who lives there.
I shall depart immediately.

After a long journey you have arrived in Moonglade. The beauty of this place is breathtaking and the serenity of Lake Elune'ara makes you feel at home here. For a moment you alomost forget why you're here.
I shall seek out the Great Cat Spirit.
After a few hours of searching the wilds you notice a large transparent panther near the lake.
I should try to approach him.

The cat spirit looks upon you with a calm and peaceful gaze, You hear a voice speak to you as though it was coming from the cat, but the creature makes no indication that it is speaking. "Greetings, my young friend. If you have come to me seeking guidance, then perhaps I can help you find what you seek."
What do you represent, spirit?

I represent the agility which bolsters you as a young druid. You have come to me to learn this power young one, and I will teach this to you. I will teach you all that is the spirit cat, provided you will listen and understand. In order to know what it means to draw upon my spirit, you need to understand the importance of the quickness of the body, as well as the resolve of the heart.
I seek to understand the importance of quickness of the body.

Power of the body is the power and swiftness of action. You must keep yourself fit at all times, both physically and mentally. The cat's slenderness highlights its agility as it is a ferocious foe in combat. The cat's slenderness, however, belies its tough body and calm mind. These are surprises you will use to your advantage. You must rely on the slenderness of the cat's body in order to master the way of the claw.
I seek to understand the importance of resolve of the heart.

Resolve of the heart is what gives you the swiftness to take action... action that is rooted in intentions that are pure and forthright. To keep the balance is not to be complacent or banal. You must show resolve for that which you believe in, and you must be willing to fight for it. The mother cat shows endless conviction in protecting her young, as does an elder cat protecting his hunting grounds. It is this resolve, this resolve of the heart, which you must come to know if you are to master the way of the claw.
I have heard your words, Great Cat Spirit, and I understand.

It remains to be seen if you are ready, young one. Even the wisest and oldest of druids are never truly ready when their ultimate time of testing comes. You have heard my words, and now you must move on. Heed what I have taught you. There will be a time when you will have your power tested. You must face your foe as the cat would - with quickness of body and with resolve of the heart. Learn from the fight, young one. Go... with my blessings.
I will stay true to the way of the claw.
You start your journey to Moonglade, the sacred place of druidism. It's a tradition for young druids to learn the bear form from the Ancient Protector Ursoc's spirit who resides there.
I shall depart immediately.

After a long journey you have arrived in Moonglade. The beauty of this place is breathtaking and the serenity of Lake Elune'ara makes you feel at home. For a moment you almost forget what brought you here.
I shall seek out the Great Bear's Spirit.
After a few hours of searching the wilds you notice a large transparent bear near the lake.
I should try to approach him.

Ursoc's spirit looks upon you with a calm and peaceful gaze. You hear a voice speak to you as though it was coming from the bear, but the creature makes no indication that it is speaking. "Greetings, my young friend. If you have come to me seeking guidance, then perhaps I can help you find what you seek."
What do you represent, ancient guardian?

I represent the strength which bolsters you as a young druid. You have come to me to learn this strength, young one, and I will teach this to you. I will teach you all that is the spirit bear, provided you will listen and understand. In order to know what it means to draw upon my spirit, you need to understand the importance of the strength of the body, as well as the strength of the heart.
I seek to understand the importance of strength of the body.

Strength of the body is the power and swiftness of action. You must keep yourself fit at all times, both physically and mentally. The bear's girth highlights its strength, as it is a ferocious foe in combat. The bear's girth, however, belies its lithe agility and sharp mind. These are surprises you will use to your advantage. You must rely on the strength of the bear's body in order to master the way of the claw.
I seek to understand the importance of strength of the heart.

Strength of the heart is what gives you the resolve to take action... action that is rooted in intentions that are pure and forthright. To keep the balance is not to be complacent or banal. You must show resolve for that which you believe in, and you must be willing to fight for it. The mother bear shows endless conviction in protecting her young, as does an elder bear protecting his den. It is this resolve, this strength of heart, which you must come to know if you are to master the way of the claw.
I have heard your words, Great Bear Spirit, and I understand.

It remains to be seen if you are ready, young one. Even the wisest and oldest of druids are never truly ready when their ultimate time of testing comes. You have heard my words, and now you must move on. Heed what I have taught you. There will be a time when you will have your strength tested. You must face your foe as the bear would - with strength of body and with strength of heart. Learn from the fight, young one. Go... with my blessings.
I will stay true to the way of the claw!

The mysteries of flight are only known to the most talented druids. Your best chance of learning them would be to seek out a druid of the talon. These masters of flight are the most ardent followers of Aviana and know all the secrets of the talon form. They commonly live in high altitude areas where their connection with the Mistress of the Birds is the strongest.
Which way leads to the highest mountain?
After a long journey you finally arrived at the foot of a mountain. Climbing such an enormous peak is no easy matter and you decide it is best to make camp and spend the night here.
I need a good sleep to climb that mountain.

You woke up to loud caws outside your tent. You leave it quickly to look for a culprit but the crow is nowhere to be found. You're confused by this situation. How can a simple crow elude an experienced druid such as yourself?
Maybe it's a sign?

After weird wakeup you eat a modest breakfast and start climbing the mountain. You estimate that it will take you a few hours to reach its peak. You can only hope that there is actually a druid of the talon living there.
I wish I could fly to the top.

It is nearly dark but you have finally arrived at the mountain's peak. You are tired and dream only of a warm bed back home. And then you suddenly hear a loud caw behind you. It is a crow, but not an ordinary one. It is several times bigger and a lot more deadly. It looks at you and then transforms into a tall night elf. You can see by his appearance that he is the person you've been looking for.
I should talk to him.

You approach him and introduce yourself shortly. He looks at you intensely with his sharp eyes before opening his mouth. "I know what you seek, my friend. The mysteries of the flight are only known to a select few and I can see in you potential to join us."
I will prove that I'm worthy.

Prove? No my friend, there's no need for that. There is no exam to pass, no challenge to complete, no problem to overcome. I will pass onto you my knowledge and if you're worthy you will understand it.
Then I'm ready to learn.

Good, my friend. Then I will tell you the secret of flight. It is knowing the true meaning of freedom. As a druid it is your duty to protect Azeroth. You can't just fly away from your obligations and hide in the clouds. The only thing that's limiting your freedom is you. Your doubts, concerns and fears chained you to the earth. True freedom is facing them head on and standing your ground instead of flying away like a coward. This is the mystery of flight. Now take to the skies and feel how free you are!
CAAAAAAW!

You have been studying ways of druidism for many years now. You practiced shapeshifting and attained complete control over it's many forms. But now you choose a new objecitve. To master the way of the stag is to follow Malorne himself, the father of the demigod Cenarius, lover of Elune, the first among the ancient guardians. Following his example is not easy and rarely anyone tries it. You will face many challenges and success is not guaranteed.
I will do my best.
To master the way of Malorne you have to gain the blessing of the demigod himself. You will depart on a long journey to understand him and his ways.
I will depart immediately.
I already bear his blessing.
You have gained the blessing of Malorne and will now face a final test. You will undergo a ritual to relive Malorne's memories from War of the Ancients and face Archimonde the Defiler.
I will not fail him.

The ritual has begun. As the world swirls around you the vision blurs and you start to hear weird sounds. You see the Defiler before you. Overcome with rage and fury you charge at him with your antlers. The ground trembles under your hooves as you sweep demons aside. You reach your enemy and he barely dodges your attack, saving himself from being impaled. You exhange blows for hours and you're getting more and more tired with each passing moment. Archimonde notices it and grabs your neck with his demonic strength. You struggle to free yourself but to no avail. He snaps your neck and as you leave the vision, the last thing you hear is furious roar of Ysera.
I still weep for the White Stag.

You have overcome Malornes challenge and gained insight about his being. With all these things you have strengthened your connection with the Waywatcher and mastered the stag form. You will use this power as Malorne himself would, to defend Azeroth and its inhabitants.
I will always follow your example.

You have spent years staying true to the light and your duties. In doing this you gained immense wisdom and experience. You can channel it into writing a libram, the holiest type of book. It will strengthen your connection to the Light and those that will wield it after you.
I will write about protecting others.
I will write about delivery of retribution.
I will write about staying justful.
I will write about importance of faith.

After days and nights of pouring yor thoughts and faith onto the paper the work is completed. The book tells how protecting others is paladins first duty and it emanates aura of Light that will strengthen its wielder.
I will stay true to my words.

After days and nights of pouring yor thoughts and faith onto the paper the work is completed. The book tells how delivering retribution is paladins first duty and it emanates aura of Light that will strengthen its wielder.
I will stay true to my words.

After days and nights of pouring yor thoughts and faith onto the paper the work is completed. The book tells how being just is paladins first duty and it emanates aura of Light that will strengthen its wielder.
I will stay true to my words.

After days and nights of pouring yor thoughts and faith onto the paper the work is completed. The book tells how being pious is paladins first duty and it emanates aura of Light that will strengthen its wielder.
I will stay true to my words.
As a master of runic magic you can use your powers to forge a runeblade. It will strengthen you and you will be able to channel your powers throught it.

The nathrezim are known for their smithing skills and have forged many powerful runeblades in history. Weapons like Frostmourne and Apocalypse are examples of your race's abilitities. Now you can use this abilities to forge a powerful blade for yourself.
As a master of runic magic you can use your powers to forge a runeblade. It will strengthen you and you will be able to channel your powers throught it.
I will forge a blade empowered by unholy magic.
I will forge a blade empowered by blood magic.
I will forge a blade empowered by frost magic.
After many nights spent forging and channeling unholy magic into the metal you have finished your blade. It emanates dark energies that will surely bring death to your enemies.
Now nothing can stop me.
After many nights spent forging and channeling blood magic into the metal you have finished your blade. It emanates dark energies that will surely bring death to your enemies.
Now nothing can stop me.
After many nights spent forging and channeling frost magic into the metal you have finished your blade. It emanates dark energies that will surely bring death to your enemies.
Now nothing can stop me.
You have been elected to lead the Cenarion Circle.
I will do my best.
I am not worthy.

The Emerald Dream is a vast, ever-changing spirit world, that exists outside the boundaries of the physical world. The Emerald Dream represents how the world would have been, if intelligent beings had not altered its surface. It is a druids duty to spend time in this realm.
I will enter the Dream.
I still have something to do.
After spending some time in the Emerald Dream you started to feel a little homesick. Maybe it is time to leave this beautiful realm and go back to Azeroth?
It is time to leave the Emerald Dream.
No, I will spend more time here.

[From.GetSocietyGreeting], [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName].

A druids true home is the Emerald Dream. You should leave the material realm behind and venture there.

[From.GetSocietyFarewell].
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
Request to rank up.
[GetAltSocietyRankUpTooltip]
Has §YHarmony§! greater or equal to 1000 and is at least an Apprentice Druid.
Has §YHarmony§! greater or equal to 3000 and is at least a Skilled Druid.
Has §YHarmony§! greater or equal to 6000 and is at least a Great Druid.
Has §YDevotion§! greater or equal to 1000 and is at least an Apprentice Priest.
Has §YDevotion§! greater or equal to 3000 and is at least a Skilled Priest.
Has §YDevotion§! greater or equal to 6000 and is at least a Great Priest.
Ancient
Ancient Protector
Ancient of Lore
Ancient of War
Ancient of Wind
Ancient Protector
Ancients are giant, sentient demigod-like trees that serve as protectors of nature. They were among the first creatures of Azeroth, the first guardians of its life.
Ancient of Lore
A type of ancient, the ancients of lore are the keepers of wisdom, and the living keys necessary to unlock nature's most guarded secrets.
Ancient of War
One of the toughest types of ancient, ancients of war train night elves in the arts of weaponry.
Ancient of Wind
Ancients of wind are able to tap into the more feral side of nature. Ancients of wind avoid combat but like other ancients, when enemies threaten nature, they battle with their allies.
You were walking in the forest when something fell from one of the branches. You lean over to pick it up. In your hand you hold a little seed.
I need to take care of it.
After many years of taking care of the little seed something awakened in it. From the broken seed sprouted a little ancient.
New life is born.
Summon Ancient
Summon one of the powerful protectors of the forest.
Ancients are powerful guardians of the forest. There are many different types of them and they have different strengths. You can choose what type of ancient you would like to summon to your court.
An ancient of war.
An ancient of lore.
An ancient of wind.

[From.GetSocietyGreeting], [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName].

I'm happy with your advancements in understanding of nature and hereby grant you a rank that is more representative of your knowledge.

[From.GetSocietyFarewell].
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
Enables decision in the §YIntrigue§! menu, to request a blessing from the ancients.
Enables decision in the §YIntrigue§! menu, to train with archdruids increasing your class level.
Enables decision in the §YIntrigue§! menu, to summon a druid to your court.
Enables decision in the §YIntrigue§! menu, to create a special [GetHospitalTempleBuilding] in your capital ([GetHospitalTemple] included).
Enables decision in the §YIntrigue§! menu, to summon the host of the forest.
Ancients are powerful beings that have supported the Cenarion Circle for several millennia. As a member, you can ask one of these ancients to grant you their blessing.
I will ask an ancient of war.
I will ask an ancient of lore.

After the taking of city your troops start sacrificing its population to the Lords of Twilight. The streets are flooded with blood and screams of innocents blend into a symphony of terror. The madness has come to this land.
Glory to the Gods Below.
Hide this event.
Send to Temple of Elune
Send this child to serve the Goddess.
Mark of Elune
This character has been blessed by Elune.
Take Vows of Purity
Take your relationship with Elune even further and vow to stay pure for 10 years.
End Celibate
You have fulfilled your vows and can end your celibate.
Break Celibate
Break your vows of purity.
Keeping Vows of Purity
This character vowed to stay pure in the name of Elune.
Touch of Chaos
Touch of Madness

I'm happy with your service to Elune and hereby grant you a rank that is more representative of your devoutness.

[From.GetSocietyFarewell].
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
It is a great honour, sister.

The Sisterhood of Elune has existed since the beginning of the Kaldorei civilization. The all-female organisation is dedicated to worshipping and serving the moon goddess Elune. Sending the girl to join them would be a great honour for her. Nonetheless she would leave your court and probably never return.
She will serve the Goddess.
I changed my mind.
The host of C'Thun has been sent to you by the Old God himself. Powerful qiraji and silithid will support you in destroying the enemies of your Master.
All hail C'Thun.
The host of the N'Zoth has been sent to you by the Old God himself. Powerful naga and other dark minions from the seas will support you in destroying the enemies of your Master.
All hail N'Zoth.
The host of Yogg-Saron has been sent to you by the Old God himself. Corrupted watchers and n'raqi will support you in destroying the enemies of your Master.
All hail Yogg-Saron.
The army of C'Thun has been sent to you by the Old God himself. Powerful qiraji and silithid will support you in unleashing madness upon Azeroth.
All hail C'Thun.
The army of the N'Zoth has been sent to you by the Old God himself. Powerful naga and k'thir will support you in unleashing madness upon Azeroth.
All hail N'Zoth.
The army of Yogg-Saron has been sent to you by the Old God himself. Corrupted watchers and n'raqi will support you in unleashing madness upon Azeroth.
All hail Yogg-Saron.
The legions of C'Thun have been sent to you by the Old God himself. Powerful qiraji and silithid will support you in bringing forth the Hour of Twilight.
All hail C'Thun.
The legions of the N'Zoth have been sent to you by the Old God himself. Powerful naga and k'thir will support you in bringing forth the Hour of Twilight.
All hail N'Zoth.
The legions of Yogg-Saron have been sent to you by the Old God himself. Corrupted watchers and n'raqi will support you in bringing forth the Hour of Twilight.
All hail Yogg-Saron.
A powerful general has been sent to you by C'Thun himself. He will serve you well and bring ruin upon enemies of the Old God.
All hail C'Thun.
A powerful general has been sent to you by N'Zoth himself. He will serve you well and bring ruin upon enemies of the Old God.
All hail N'Zoth.
A powerful general has been sent to you by Yogg-Saron himself. He will serve you well and bring ruin upon enemies of the Old God.
All hail Yogg-Saron.
A monstrous C'Thrax general has been sent to you by your Master himself. He will serve you well and bring ruin upon enemies of the Old God.
He will surely bring ruin upon Azeroth.

You can feel the power of C'Thun all over your body. The great eye overtakes your mind and enters the depths of your consciousness. The Master is pleased with you and grants you power so you can serve him better.
I will bring ruin to enemies of C'Thun.

You can feel the power of C'Thun all over your body. The great eye overtakes your mind and enters the depths of your consciousness. Though the Master is pleased with you, his gratitude is a little more than you can handle.
UULL lwhuk H'IWN!

You can feel the power of N'Zoth all over your body. The great eye overtakes your mind and enters the depths of your consciousness. The Master is pleased with you and grants you power so you can serve him better.
I will bring ruin to enemies of N'Zoth.

You can feel the power of N'Zoth all over your body. The great eye overtakes your mind and enters the depths of your consciousness. Though the Master is pleased with you, his gratitude is a little more than you can handle.
UULL lwhuk H'IWN!

You can feel the power of Yogg-Saron all over your body. The great eye overtakes your mind and enters the depths of your consciousness. The Master is pleased with you and grants you power so you can serve him better.
I will bring ruin to enemies of Yogg-Saron.

You can feel the power of Yogg-Saron all over your body. The great eye overtakes your mind and enters the depths of your consciousness. Though the Master is pleased with you, his gratitude is a little more than you can handle.
UULL lwhuk H'IWN!

You entered Ahn'Qiraj with a small band of soldiers. After overcoming every challenge thrown at you and your men, despite heavy losses, you finally stand before one of the mightiest enemies you will ever face! His whispers enter your mind as soon as your gaze upon the horrific creature. However, with your strong will you overcome the madness and lead the charge against C'Thun.
Die, you monster!

The word of a daring feat has spread far and wide across Azeroth: an Old God has been slain! C'Thun is now dead following the sojourn of a small task force led by [From.GetDynName] into the Old God's lair, the dangerous and fortified city of Ahn'Qiraj in the southern desert of Silithus.\n\nThey accomplished what was thought impossible. Through wit and might they slew the Old God's minions and bested his generals until they finally brought down C'Thun himself. Many perished along the way, but their morale did not falter, even with the Old God's whispers piercing through their minds. Now that the Old God's reign over Silithus has come to an end, [From.GetFirstName] will now be known as the Godslayer.
C'Thun is Dead
An Old God has fallen!
That is not dead which can eternal lie.

The Cenarion Circle was part of the kaldorei cultures since its begining. It teached drudism to night elves and others that wanted to follow that path. As new archdruid you can decide on changing that policy. What is your choice?
The Cenarion Circle will always be part of the Kaldorei.
The Cenarion Circle must stay neutral.
Enables decision in the §YIntrigue§! menu to take Vows of Purity.
Enables decision in the §YIntrigue§! menu to end your Vows of Purity.
Enables decision in the §YIntrigue§! menu to break your Vows of Purity.
Enables decision in the §YIntrigue§! menu to summon a priest to your court.
Enables a title decision to build temple holding in the province.
Build Barrow Den
A druid's body is defenseless when in the Emerald Dream. You need to build a barrow den to protect yourself.
To complete this quest, you have to succesfully complete the event chain to build a barrow den.
Build Hospital
One of our most important duties is to treat the sick. Creating a hospital in your demesne will help you fulfill it.
To complete this quest build a hospital in your province.

[target_grandmaster.GetSocietyGreeting], [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName].

We are pleased to hear that you have constructed a new hospital in your possessions. Helping others is something all good people shall strive for.

[target_grandmaster.GetSocietyFarewell],
Signed, [target_grandmaster.GetSocietyRank] [target_grandmaster.GetFirstName]
I live to help others.
Could cost you up to §Y200§!¤
Could cost you up to §Y300§!¤ and §Y100 [This.Religion.GetPietyName]§!
Could cost you up to §Y500§!¤ and §Y300 [This.Religion.GetPietyName]§!
A barrow den is a place in which druids hibernate during their visits to the Emerald Dream. This underground labyrinths protect the druids when they are most vulnerable.
I should build one for me and my druids.

Barrow dens often differ in size, from the small hole under the tree to massive cave complexes. In general, the bigger the den is, the better protection it offers. It will also increase the cost of construction.
A small one will suffice.
A medium one will be perfect.
A large one is what I need.
You have found a perfect place for your barrow den. You decided to create one under the tree for better protection. Now you need to plant it and oversee its growth.
I will do it myself.
I will need some to help me with it.
I will ask local nature for help.

A vile satyr is disrupting the growth of the tree. He is trying to infect the tree with his magic and is playing tricks on everyone nearby. Thankfully he is completely incompetent and mostly harmless but his activities are still slowing the growth of the tree.
I will have to weather it.
I will pay someone to deal with it.
I will write "orange juice" on a bottle of ogre mead and leave it near his lair.
The growth of your tree has recently slowed. It  only grows at a rate of a quarter of a meter a day now and will most likely stay that way unless you do something about it.
I will have to weather it.
I will pay someone to help me.
I will ask a local ancient for help.
You have found a corrupted patch of land this morning. Its foul energies corrupt the area and slow down the growth of your tree. Unless something is done about it, it will corrupt the whole area!
I will send for help.
I will gather local druids and cleanse it.
I know just a spell for it.
After months of growth what was a little sapling now towers over the forest. You stand proud in it's shadow looking upon the result of all your hardships.
Now we start digging.
The excavation work for your barrow den has been slowed due to kobold attacks. Unless something is done the work will be slowed extensively.
I will have to weather it.
I will pay someone to get rid of them.
I will show them the wrath of nature.
The excavation work is not going as fast as you thought it would. If everything stays as it is, you can expect months of extra work.
I can wait.
Nonsense, I just need to optimise the work.

The excavation work has been slowed down due to complaints from an earth elemental. He's nagging you the whole day about the excavation and threatens to report you to the Earthen Ring for unauthorized digging.
I will have to weather it.
I need to get a lawyer.
This excavation is legal according to article 56, section 12.
The excavation work is complete at last. All that's left is decorating and furnishing.
I hope there will be no more troubles.
The creation of your barrow den is complete. Far below the ground under the enormous tree you can now sleep safely. Staying in the Emerald Dream is going to be much safer from this point onward.
A little nap wouldn't hurt.
Mark of Lore
Mark of War

Average Barrow Den
Large Barrow Den

Average Protection
Good Protection

[From.GetSocietyGreeting], [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName].

Barrow dens are crucial to ensure one's safety during their visit to the Emerald Dream. You should construct one immediately.

Stop Paying Tribute to Enemy
You should end your tributary relationship with your enemies.
Kaldorei Substate
Kaldorei Substates
Kaldorei Leadership
Substate
Acquire Remnant of Caer Darrow
Two heads are better than one.

As the magical powers resonate through your body, you start to feel burning pain in your head. Thousands of thoughts and ideas come to your mind and you are slowly overwhelmed by all this knowledge. And then you realize that you're screaming but your mouth is closed. You turn your head left and see another head. Your second head.
UNLIMITED POWER!

Ogre magi are a rare phenomenon among ogres. They are naturally disposed to beceome powerful magic users and their birth is seen as a good omen. But not all of them are born. Through use of powerful magic you can turn a normal into a two headed one. Because of your access to a magical artifact you now have an opportunity to do so.
I will use the powers of Caer Darrow.
I will use the powers of a magical artifact.

After what seems like an eternity, the agents that you dispatched to find what's left of the rune stone of Caer Darrow, have returned. They present to you a small trivial looking shard and you instantly feel the power resonating within it.
The wait was worth it.

The Cenarion Circle has found itself in peril. With their structures destroyed they are no longer able to excercise military might and the society is now focusing on theology and promoting their way of life.
Interesting.

You have been studying the ways of druidism for many years now. You have practiced shapeshifting and attained complete control over it's many forms. But now you choose a new objective. To master the way of the cat is to follow Ashamane herself, the ferocious Wild God that fell during War of the Ancients. Following her example is not easy. You will face many challenges and success is not guaranteed.
I will do my best.
To master the ways of Ashamane you have to gain her blessing. You will depart on a long journey to understand her and her ways.
I will depart immediately.
I already bear her blessing.
You have gained the blessing of Ashamane and will now face a final test. You will undergo a ritual to relive Ashamane's memories from War of the Ancients and face the Pitlord Ronokon.
I will not fail her.

The ritual has begun. As the world swirls around you the vision blurs and you start to hear weird sounds. You see the monstrous pitlord before you. You feel that your body is extremely tired like you have been fighting the demon for hours. After trying to reach him again and again you can barely stand as exhaustion starts to blur your eyesight. With your final ounce of strength you leap towards your enemy in your final act of desperation. You can feel that his foul spear in your chest but it doesn't matter now because yout fangs are plunged deep into his neck. The annihilan tries to free himself with all his might but it's too late for him. Fires of fel explosion devour both of you and the world starts to swirl around as you leave your vision.
I still weep for Ashamane.

You have overcome Ashamane's challenge and gained insight about her being. With all these things you have strengthened your connection with the Great Panther and mastered the cat form. You will use this power as Ashamane herself would: To defend Azeroth and its inhabitants.
I will always follow your example.

You have been studying the ways of druidism for many years now. You have practiced shapeshifting and attained complete control over it's many forms. But now you choose a new objective. To master the way of the bear is to follow Ursoc himself. The Bear Lord. The Mighty. The foremost defender of Azeroth. Following his example is not easy. You will face many challenges and success is not guaranteed.
I will do my best.
To master ways of Ursoc you have to gain blessing of the demigod himself. You will depart on a long journey to understand him and his ways.
I will depart immediately.
I already bear his blessing.
You have gained the blessing of Ursoc and will now face a final test. You will undergo a ritual to relive Ursoc's memories from War of the Ancients and face hordes of demons.
I will not fail him.

The ritual has begun. As the world swirls around you, the vision blurs and you start to hear strange sounds. You see countless demons before you. You charge at them bravely with all your might, and you slay hundreds of them with your claws and unbridled fury. However, your body slowly tires and weakens with every slain demon. Nonetheless, you continue to fight to protect Azeroth and continue to unleash your fury on them even with your vision darkening. You close your eyes for just a moment, and the sounds of battle are muffled as you leave the vision.
I still weep for the Bear Lord.

You have overcome Ursoc's challenge and gained insight about his being. With all these things you have strengthened your connection with the Mighty and mastered the bear form. You will use this power as Ursoc himself would: To defend Azeroth and its inhabitants.
I will always follow your example.

You have been studying the ways of druidism for many years now. You have practiced shapeshifting and attained complete control over its many forms, and now you choose a new goal. To master the way of the talon is to follow Aviana herself. Mistress of the Skies and Mother of Flight. Following her example is not easy. You will face many challenges, and success is not guaranteed.
I will do my best.
To master ways of Aviana you have to gain her blessing You will depart on a long journey to understand her and her ways.
I will depart immediately.
I already bear her blessing.
You have gained the blessing of Aviana and will now face a final test. You will undergo a ritual to relive Aviana's memories from War of the Ancients and face hordes of demons.
I will not fail her.

The ritual has begun. As the world swirls around you, the vision blurs and you start to hear strange sounds. You see the sky swarming with foul demons. You nosedive into hordes of felbats sending many of them to the ground. You know you need to protect the skies and give coverage to your allies on the ground. You fight off countless flying demons while evading Infernals falling from above. Despite fighting with all your strength, the demons finally overcome you. Your lifeless body is falling from the skies and the whole world swirls around you as you leave the vision.
I still weep for the Mistress of the Mother Tree.

You have overcome Aviana's challenge and gained insight about her being. With all these things you have strengthened your connection with the Mother of Flight and mastered the talon form. You will use this power as Aviana herself would. To defend Azeroth and its inhabitants.
I will always follow her example.

Recently Invited Talented Student

You have recently noticed a promising student while visiting [From.Society.GetName] headquarters. After approaching the student, you offer [From.GetHerHim] tutelage along with a place at your court. After getting a little flustered from first receiving your offer, [From.GetSheHe] has agreed to join your court.
I am sure you are destined for greatness.

After spending some time in your court, [From.GetFirstName]'s skills and knowledge have improved considerably, and [From.GetSheHe] has shown [From.GetHerHis] true potential. [From.GetSheHeCap] has also started to see you not only as a teacher, but also as a friend.
I am honoured to be your mentor.
I am honoured to be your mentor and more...

After spending some time in your court, [From.GetFirstName] has not made any considerable improvements despite the potential [From.GetSheHe] was showing earlier. [From.GetSheHeCap] seems to be frustrated with trying and attempts to match your expectations don't seem to get very far...
Maybe I was wrong about [From.GetHerHim]?
Maybe [From.GetSheHe] just needs some encouragement...

Hears Whispers
This character hears the whispers of the Old Gods.

The whispers of your masters have been getting stronger recently. They are pouring their eldritch knowledge into your mind, but it's simply too much for your mind to take and you're unable to make sense of any of it. You need to focus on one fragment of the whispers and write them down, but first, you need writing materials.
That one servant girl had such smooth skin.
After spending some time, trying to filter out all but one of the voices and gathering the needed materials, you can now write down its whispers.
It speaks of wars from long-forgotten eons.
It speaks of temple-cities made of black obsidian.
It speaks of a creature with a thousand forms.
It speaks of forgotten starry secrets.

As time progresses, the whispers get stronger and turn into visions. Before long you can see countless legions of the Void and terrible monstrosities designed to wage never-ending war in the name of their masters.

As time progresses, the whispers get stronger and turn into visions. Before long you can see black temple-cities crowded with pyramids of incomprehensible geometry and obelisks portraying acts of eldritch depravity.
As time progresses, the whispers get stronger and turn into visions. Before long you can see subterranean dungeons filled with hooded beings plotting to advance their shadowy designs.

As time progresses, the whispers get stronger and turn into visions. Before long you can see the endless Void filled with great spheres illuminated in twilight with huge tendrils coming out of their cracked exteriors.

Ywaq are almost... Y'za plahf YES! YES! Uovssh thyzz... qwaz... MORE! MORE! MY EYES ARE OPEN! Gag vwah gag yyqzz ez hoz shath'yar plahf... UULL lwhuk H'IWN! SHEL! SHG! SHUUL! QOR MAGG! It... is... finished...

It's common that cultists of the Twilight Hammer can hear the whispers of the Old Gods, but especially enthusiastic individuals write them down in order to preserve the enigmatic wisdom of their masters to show their §Y[This.TrueReligion.GetPietyName]§!. However, because they often do not understand what they do, the results of their efforts have the §Ylowest quality§!.
The Old Gods' slaves, that are widely known for their §Y[This.TrueReligion.GetPietyName]§!, frequently hear the whispers of their master, but being able to decipher them is quite §YUncommon§!.

It's exceptionally §YRare§! for the Old Gods to grant mortal zealots not only the ability to hear their sacred voices for their §Y[This.TrueReligion.GetPietyName]§!, but also the ability to understand what they say to some extent.

The Old Gods whisper myths of long forgotten times, a blessing that only the most devoted get for their §Y[This.TrueReligion.GetPietyName]§!. If someone writes these revelations down, [This.GetHerHis] efforts will bring the §Yhighest quality§! results.
Twilight Architecture
This character uses the powers of the Old Gods to use elementium as a building material.

You have been staying in solitary reclusion ever since you murdered your lover and your brother's wife, Sif. The guilt of your deed and the whispers of Yogg-Saron gnaw on your every thought, keeping you unable to contain and guard the Old God effectively. Only time will tell if you can redeem yourself or if you will fall into madness.

You have been staying in solitary reclusion ever since the murder of your wife Sif by the traitorous frost giants. Now you sit on your throne without the drive to continue your Keeper duties. There is no point in your life without Sif.
A dark shadow lies upon Ulduar.
He will know what I need to do.
There is yet hope.

After centuries spent in lethargy you have finally seen the truth. Witnessing the rise and fall of empires, the birth and extinction of entire species made you understand that foolishness of mortals is the only constant. Yogg-Saron shall be released and Azeroth will be reborn in darkness.

After centuries spent in lethargy you have finally seen the truth. Yogg-Saron has revealed to you the treachery of Loken and Sif. Betrayed by your brother, by your wife, by your Makers. There is no other future for you. Yogg-Saron shall be released and Azeorth will be reborn in darkness.
I am Forever!
Behold the power of the storms and despair!

After centuries spent in lethargy you have finally seen the truth. For millennia the poison of Yogg-Saron has stilled your mind and hand but no more. His darkness shall be purged from Ulduar and order restored. Only you can do it, only you have the "means" to stop him. Your death will herald the end of his shadow.

After centuries spent in lethargy you have finally seen the truth. For millenia the treachery of your brother has left you hopeless but no more. His darkness and that of Yogg-Saron shall be purged from Ulduar and order restored. Only you can do it, only you have the means to kill the traitor. His death will herald the end of the shadow.
Forgive me, my Makers.
Rest in peace, brother.
